mesquite.lib.characters

Interface MAdjustableDistribution

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Annotatable, Listable, MCharactersDistribution, MCharactersStatesHolder, Renamable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MCharactersHistory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MCategoricalAdjustable, MCategoricalHistory, MContinuousAdjustable, MContinuousHistory, MDNAAdjustable, MDNAHistory, MMeristicAdjustable, MMeristicHistory, MProteinAdjustable, MProteinHistory

    public interface MAdjustableDistribution
extends MCharactersDistribution, Annotatable
    An interface to signal that a MCharactersDistribution can be changed (i.e. its states set, its parent data set, the number of taxa readjusted, and so on. Some MCharactersDistributions, such as those that report characters from stored matrices in a CharacterData object, are not adjustable. See general discussion of character storage classes under CharacterState
